title: How to Locate and Beat the 3rd Colossus in Shadow of the Colossus

steps.headline: Head out the shrine and call Agro with the X button.
steps.description: Wait for Agro to arrive and press ∆ to ride.

steps.headline: Take out the sword by pressing O.
steps.description: Look around until you find the direction where the light beams centralize, which should be around the Shrine of Worship .

steps.headline: Travel behind the shrine and go through the dirt bridge.
steps.description: The dirt bridge is the same one you used when you traveled to the second colossus, but instead of heading down the branching path at the end, head up.

steps.headline: Head northeast.
steps.description: Keep traveling until you find a path between the mountains, go through this path until you arrive at a very creepy-looking lake with a large platform at the middle of it.

steps.headline: Dismount from Agro by pressing ∆ and jump into the water.
steps.description: Swim toward the fallen walkway at the left side of the lake and climb onto it.

steps.headline: Jump toward the ledge with green leaves as soon as you reach the top of the walkway.
steps.description: Then keep moving toward the right side of the ledge until you get to the next side, and jump to the platform. Be extremely careful while jumping across the platforms; it's a real pain to swim back to the walkway, and the lake looks really creepy.

steps.headline: Keep walking forward until you see a set of stairs that leads up to the center of the platform.
steps.description: Once there, a cut scene will play, and Gaius will attack you.

steps.headline: Head toward the circular platform at the middle of the arena.
steps.description: This is your first priority, you won't be able to progress on this battle unless you do this.

steps.headline: Wait for Gaius to try to attack you with it's sword.
steps.description: There are two possibilities here: if Gaius is too close, he will attempt to stomp you or he will use his sword. If Gaius is too close and tries to stomp on you, run across the arena and lure him away from the platform. Once you get some distance between him and the platform, he will attempt to use his sword and crush you—this is what you want!

steps.headline: Run on the opposite side of Gaius if he attempts to use his sword.
steps.description: This will cause him to strike the platform you were standing on, which will destroy his arm armor and reveal fur.

steps.headline: Use Gaius's sword to climb onto him.
steps.description: After he hits the ground, immediately run toward Gaius and jump on his sword and onto his arm.

steps.headline: Climb toward Gaius's head.
steps.description: This is where the first magic circle is.

steps.headline: Attack the magic circle.
steps.description: Remember to let your strike charge before attempting to stab the magic circle.

steps.headline: Make your way towards Gaius's back then down toward his waist.
steps.description: Go around and climb the fur on his stomach.

steps.headline: Attack the second magic circle.
steps.description: Another magic circle will appear on his stomach once the magic circle on his head disappears. Charge up your sword and attack the magic circle here until he dies.

text: Locating the Third Colossus Head out the shrine and call Agro with the X button. Wait for Agro to arrive and press ∆ to ride. Take out the sword by pressing O. Look around until you find the direction where the light beams centralize, which should be around the Shrine of Worship . Travel behind the shrine and go through the dirt bridge. The dirt bridge is the same one you used when you traveled to the second colossus, but instead of heading down the branching path at the end, head up. Head northeast. Keep traveling until you find a path between the mountains, go through this path until you arrive at a very creepy-looking lake with a large platform at the middle of it. Dismount from Agro by pressing ∆ and jump into the water. Swim toward the fallen walkway at the left side of the lake and climb onto it. Jump toward the ledge with green leaves as soon as you reach the top of the walkway. Then keep moving toward the right side of the ledge until you get to the next side, and jump to the platform. Be extremely careful while jumping across the platforms; it's a real pain to swim back to the walkway, and the lake looks really creepy. Keep walking forward until you see a set of stairs that leads up to the center of the platform. Once there, a cut scene will play, and Gaius will attack you. Defeating the Third Colossus Head toward the circular platform at the middle of the arena. This is your first priority, you won't be able to progress on this battle unless you do this. Wait for Gaius to try to attack you with it's sword. There are two possibilities here: if Gaius is too close, he will attempt to stomp you or he will use his sword. If Gaius is too close and tries to stomp on you, run across the arena and lure him away from the platform. Once you get some distance between him and the platform, he will attempt to use his sword and crush you—this is what you want! Run on the opposite side of Gaius if he attempts to use his sword. This will cause him to strike the platform you were standing on, which will destroy his arm armor and reveal fur. Use Gaius's sword to climb onto him. After he hits the ground, immediately run toward Gaius and jump on his sword and onto his arm. Climb toward Gaius's head. This is where the first magic circle is. Attack the magic circle. Remember to let your strike charge before attempting to stab the magic circle. Make your way towards Gaius's back then down toward his waist. Go around and climb the fur on his stomach. Attack the second magic circle. Another magic circle will appear on his stomach once the magic circle on his head disappears. Charge up your sword and attack the magic circle here until he dies.
